Plot..........:

UFC 3: The American Dream paved the way to the end of tournament style of fighting in the UFC.

As much as UFC 1 set MMA fighting in motion UFC 3 changed it's direction. The single night tournament fighting bit the UFC in the ass as the fighters went down to injury unable to finish the nights matches & a substitute fighter who hadn't fought all night.
